message.help:
Hi, I'm Anime Alarm!
I'm capable of bringing the latest anime episodes straight to your DMs for download and many more.
Here's how to take advantage of my greatness:

/watch - follow an anime for new episodes
/unwatch - stop following an anime
/latest - download the latest episode of any anime instantly
/help - get help and learn about Anime Alarm
/donate - donate to help this project
/recommend - get anime recommendations based on what other people using Anime Alarm are watching
message.help_admin:
Hi, I'm Anime Alarm!
I'm capable of bringing the latest anime episodes straight to your DMs for download and many more.
Here's how to take advantage of my greatness:

/watch - follow an anime for new episodes
/unwatch - stop following an anime
/latest - download the latest episode of any anime instantly
/help - get help and learn about Anime Alarm
/donate - donate to help this project
/recommend - get anime recommendations based on what other people using Anime Alarm are watching
/usercount - get number of users
/animecount - get number of anime
/broadcast - broadcast messages to all users
donate: You can donate in Bitcoin and Ethereum to help the development of this project.
